title.rendered: How to Run Facebook Ads : Step by Step Guide for Facebook Advertisement

content.rendered:
[et_pb_section fb_built=”1″ _builder_version=”4.16″ global_colors_info=”{}”][et_pb_row _builder_version=”4.16″ background_size=”initial” background_position=”top_left” background_repeat=”repeat” global_colors_info=”{}”][et_pb_column type=”4_4″ _builder_version=”4.16″ custom_padding=”|||” global_colors_info=”{}” custom_padding__hover=”|||”][et_pb_text _builder_version=”4.16″ global_colors_info=”{}” text_font_size=”15px”]Every Businessman has an intention to create more revenue for their business. As such advertising through a very easy and inexpensive means is always beneficial. In such cases running a Facebook Ads is very beneficial as it is cost-efficient

These days Facebook has become a very easy platform when it comes to your digital marketing as one can effectively promote they are products to almost two billion people around the world. In order to meet the turnover targets, one needs to calculate the potential customers. In order to reach them a person is to make a use of Facebook Ads that offers E-Commerce solutions. In addition, one could make a use of advertising tools such as post, photos and videos and links them to a person’s website for more information.

FB ADS give a platform where one can fish for the amplified amount of customers. Various targeting options are possible through a variety of post in advertisement tools.

The following are a step by step guide for Facebook Ads. This will help to launch a successful Facebook Campaign without wasting too much effort and money

1. This is the primary steps for those who have never created an advertising page before.

The prima facie requirement is to set up an ad account

  • Go home to the ad manager then click the “ad account”
  • Click on the account settings that are placed on the top menu bar.
    • page will open
    • Provide the account information
  • Facebook tool give one an offer to let someone else manage the advertising page
    • scroll down to add account roles section
    • click the option “add a person”
    • a user can define the authority of the admin

2. Facebook Campaign page will launch

  • Add a new payment method
  • Open the billing tab in the ads manager
  • click “add payment” method
  • enter the payment details

3. After launching Facebook Paid Ads, a user can move to the most critical part in Facebook Advertising Strategy which is to find the right audience.

Remember 7 important key factors to determine the right audience the 7 key factors are-

  • The influencers are such that would manipulate the success of the product. These are such players that could help in the research work and partner themselves with the user for mutual benefits.
  • The correct advertising tools to gain proper advertisement that could also provide a good amount of information to the customers.
  • The events or the organization that can be conducted or attended from time to time where the user can provide relevant information about the products.
  • A website can play a very important role in the digital marketing sector as such selection of a website is a very important concern.
  • The point of sale where the product will be able to capture maximum turnover.
  • The use of correct E-Commerce and Technical platform that could have the audience to directly communicate with the user or the user’s company.
  • The selection of proper feedback procedure so that the audience can be able to give taste and doubts on the product.

4. Create Facebook Ads by using the audience insight tool available with the Facebook

  • Go to audience Insight
  • Enter the “seed audience” so that they could analyze the audience feedback
  • Click “page likes” on the top menu
  • Click the list of pages that would be relevant for the audience

5. Once pages potential interest and other determining factors are created Running Facebook Ads begins

In this section when one create Facebook ads campaign there are three ways of launching

    • Boost the post
    • Self-serve ad creative tool
    • Power Editor tool

6. After selecting the correct way to launch the campaign, Facebook Marketing need to define the objective.

By choosing to create an ad placed on the top right corner of the Facebook profile

  • There are the different type of objective in Facebook Ads: Awareness, Consideration and Conversion
  • Select the objective very correctly
  • Once you select the objective. You have to give a name for that objective

[/et_pb_text][/et_pb_column][/et_pb_row][et_pb_row _builder_version=”4.16″ custom_padding=”3px|0px|17.6563px|0px|false|false” global_colors_info=”{}”][et_pb_column type=”4_4″ _builder_version=”4.16″ custom_padding=”|||” global_colors_info=”{}” custom_padding__hover=”|||”][et_pb_image src=”https://AA Group.com/wp-content/uploads/2018/07/audience.png” align_tablet=”center” align_last_edited=”on|desktop” _builder_version=”4.16″ global_colors_info=”{}” align_phone=”center”] 
[/et_pb_image][/et_pb_column][/et_pb_row][et_pb_row _builder_version=”4.16″ custom_margin=”-11px|||” custom_padding=”17.6563px|0px|0|0px|false|false” global_colors_info=”{}”][et_pb_column type=”4_4″ _builder_version=”4.16″ custom_padding=”|||” global_colors_info=”{}” custom_padding__hover=”|||”][et_pb_text _builder_version=”4.16″ global_colors_info=”{}” text_font_size=”15px”]

7. After filling up the required details, one needs to select the right audience which is critical for Facebook Ads Campaign.

It is necessary to fill up all the essential fields to help Facebook search the proper audience for the user.

    • Select the right audience with help of Audience Insight
    • Run 2-3 Facebook Ads Campain and test, which is working best
    • Use Split test feature

[/et_pb_text][/et_pb_column][/et_pb_row][et_pb_row _builder_version=”4.16″ custom_padding=”0|0px|17.6563px|0px|false|false” global_colors_info=”{}”][et_pb_column type=”4_4″ _builder_version=”4.16″ custom_padding=”|||” global_colors_info=”{}” custom_padding__hover=”|||”][et_pb_image src=”https://AA Group.com/wp-content/uploads/2018/07/budget.png” align_tablet=”center” align_last_edited=”on|desktop” _builder_version=”4.16″ global_colors_info=”{}” align_phone=”center”] 
[/et_pb_image][/et_pb_column][/et_pb_row][et_pb_row _builder_version=”4.16″ global_colors_info=”{}”][et_pb_column type=”4_4″ _builder_version=”4.16″ custom_padding=”|||” global_colors_info=”{}” custom_padding__hover=”|||”][et_pb_text _builder_version=”4.16″ global_colors_info=”{}” text_font_size=”15px”]

8. On the completion of the step, one needs to determine a daily or a lifetime budget

  • I would prefer to start with the low budget not more than $5 on a campaign
  • Once you have created a couple of Facebook Ads Campaign wait for the 1-2 week
  • Let Facebook collect more detail data
  • Now spend more money on the Facebook Ads campaign, which is performed better

All the above steps are critical process after which comes the designing of the ads. With the help of FB tool, one can determine the ads and inset design that is best suitable for them. One can edit headline; item in a text, install a call-to-action button and other effects are available in the Facebook for their ads.

Conclusion

Facebook Ads are a very powerful tool for any business. As Facebook as BIllion od active users. You need to understand the platform and once you understand the platform you are good to grow your business fastly. Always research before creating any Facebook Ads Campaign. Any doubt please comment below and I will surely help you.
